channel.title: Password messed up !REP ++!
channel.description:
hey i know there is actually no reason for me to look for someones password in my files. But my server shows a code, as seen below
[ACCOUNT] character-username = Nigah character-password = 0a98f7edbd02e823546cd0b23c9870ce
instead of the code, i would like to have the normal password, which helps me to recover someones account if he forgot password. I have searched on mopar and googled it for about one and a half hour now, and I didn't find anything. A year ago i already tried to fix it, and after one minute of searching I found something, now I forgot how it works and I cant find anything.. help = rep + So, in short: How can I make the file show the password, not the code?

item.title: Password messed up !REP ++!
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

thanks alot the word you told me (hash) made the searching easier. I found something now and fixed it working yay rep+

Read full topic

@purestmage74 wrote:

Hash password, if im right it’s in your save game method to fix it up.
Hope it helps some.
